attributes.action: bring back free eye tests for all
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: how many people of the general public know scotland has free eye tests for ALL but rest of UK does not. the value of which is appx £40 but in england nhs opticians get paid half @ appx £19.40 and only certain categories of people qualify. surely blindness is THE most valuable sense?
